subject: Basketball
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A.  has fined the Minnesota Timberwolves president, David Kahn, $50,000 for his comments about forward Michael Beasley’s marijuana  use.
snippet: The N.B.A.  has fined the Minnesota Timberwolves president, David Kahn, $50,000 for his comments about forward Michael Beasley’s marijuana  use.
